title: leave Buster
body:
thanks riot

Your client stuffs up and cant load into a game. 
and i get a 20 minute leave buster. 
Seriously, on the first offence of the day. Havnt had a client failure for a week .

replies.body:
If you're seeing consistent client errors, then there's likely something up with your local client or your connection, and you should look into fixing those. If you afk a lot, and the DCs are just the last straws earning you Leaver Busters, then it's because you've used up your free passes to afk. DCs/AFKs happen, but at a point Riot have to consider the impact on the rest of the players in that game too.

If it's client issues, **clean reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) is highly recommended.

You can also **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can help you with troubleshooting.
